title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Pharmacy Act 2007 (Special measures
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Pharmacy Act 2007 (Special measures 

registration having regard to Covid-19) (No. 2) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited pharmacy act 2007 (special measure registration regard covid-19) (no 2) order 2020

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. The 30th of June 2021 is specified as the different date for the purposes
text_raw:
2. The 30th of June 2021 is specified as the different date for the purposes 

of section 77(6) of the Pharmacy Act 2007. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 December, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [691] 3
text_norm: 2 30th june 2021 specified different date purpose section 77(6) pharmacy act 2007 given official seal 23 december 2020 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 5th january 2021 691 3

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order specifies 30 June 2021 as the date on which a Section 77 registration 
still in force shall cease to have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [691]
